title: Enlarge header logo image for better visibility

requirements.text: Increase the rendered size of the header brand logo image element at XPath /html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/header[1]/div[1]/div[1]/a[1]/img[1] so it is visibly larger (similar to the prominence of the previous brand text), while still fitting cleanly within the existing header height (h-16) without overflowing or being clipped.

quotes: make it a littile bigger jus like the old text it should be visible nowbuild

acceptanceCriteria: The header logo image is noticeably larger than before and is easily readable at a glance.
The logo image remains fully contained within the header (no vertical overflow/clipping) across common viewport widths.
Only the selected logo element styling/attributes are modified; no unrelated header/nav elements are changed.

constraints: Apply changes only to the selected element (/html/body/div/div/header/div/div/a/img).
Do not edit any files under frontend/src/components/ui or other immutable paths defined by the system context.
nonGoals: Changing the logo file asset itself.
Changing navigation layout, header height, or adding/removing brand text.
